items.sentence: I didn\'t expect sailing to be this much fun.
I didn\'t go to the party because I was sick.
I\'ll never forget the day that we first met.
Tom had never done anything like that before.
Tom had never done anything like this before.
Tom had never seen anything like this before.
Tom had no idea what Mary was planning to do.
Tom had no intention of quarreling with Mary.
Tom won\'t be able to babysit for us tonight.
Tom won\'t be able to do anything about that.
Tom is having a lot of trouble finding a job.
Tom is looking for a bigger house to live in.
Tom is looking for a place to stay in Boston.
Tom is looking forward to going to Australia.
I\'ve already told Tom what needs to be done.
I\'ve always gotten along very well with Tom.
I\'ve been playing golf for a very long time.
